title: card.motion.mode Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Configures accelerometer motion monitoring parameters used when providing results to card.motion.

apiVersion.description: Semantic version of the Notecard API

start.description: Set to true to enable the Notecard accelerometer and start motion tracking

stop.description: Set to true to disable the Notecard accelerometer and stop motion tracking

seconds.description: Period for each bucket of movements to be accumulated when minutes is used with card.motion

sensitivity.description: Used to set the accelerometer sample rate
